Class NLIRArithmetic

  • java.lang.Object
    • jminusminus.NLIRInstruction
      • jminusminus.NLIRArithmetic
  • class NLIRArithmetic
extends NLIRInstruction
    LIR instruction corresponding to the JVM arithmetic instructions.
